message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to purchase it from me for $12000?
Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm not quite ready to pay $12000. Would you be willing to consider $10000?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see that you're willing to pay $10000, but I'm not sure I can go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about we discuss $11000?
